location.title: Location
location.demo_using: Using demo location (Marina Bay) for testing.
location.demo_desc: Enable this to simulate a Singapore location (Marina Bay), even if you're overseas. This makes reverse-geocoding and location features testable without GPS spoofing.
location.onemap_note: OneMap token is fetched automatically using the embedded demo account and cached for a few days. The app falls back to a coarse N/E/W/C/S region label if the network is unavailable.

r1.title: Mini First Aid Kit
r1.desc: Compact and portable. Fits into a bag for everyday readiness.
r1.longDesc: Multi-award-winning Mini First Aid ... act confidently.

r2.title: Emergency Whistle & Torch
r2.desc: 120 dB electronic whistle with built-in LED torch for signalling.
r2.longDesc: Be heard and be seen. ... when you need it most.
details: Electronic whistle body with integrated LED torch (up to 120 dB)
Rechargeable Li-ion battery (≈300 mAh), 1.5–2 h full charge
Runtime: up to ~2 h siren use / ~3–4 h torch (mode-dependent)

r3.title: Reusable Face Masks
r3.desc: Washable adult mask with PM2.5 filters and adjustable fit.
r3.longDesc: A comfortable, reusable mask ... crowded spaces.
details: Mouldable nose wire to improve seal & reduce glasses fog
Washable; recommended to remove filter before washing
Typical filter replacement: every 3–7 days of use (conditions vary)
Resealable storage pouch for hygiene on the go

r4.title: Emergency Water Pouches
r4.desc: UHT-sterilized drinking water in foil pouches. 5-year shelf life.
r4.longDesc: Clean drinking water is the #1 priority ... minimal fuss.
details: 5-year shelf life (store in a cool, dry place)
Heat-sealed, easy-tear pouches; no bottle opener required
Compact for go-bags or car kits; portion-controlled to reduce waste
Complies with common emergency-relief packaging standards
Intended for emergency use and short-term hydration

r5.title: Survival Blanket
r5.desc: Reflective thermal blanket to retain body heat in cold, wind or rain.
r5.longDesc: A lightweight mylar emergency blanket ... home emergency drawers.
details: Reflective mylar surface—retains up to 90% body heat
Waterproof and windproof; blocks rain and spray
Reusable if handled gently; tear-resistant film
Multi-use: wrap, shelter roof, ground sheet, poncho or signal panel
